content: the sheafband is an easy-to-make headband inspired by wheat ears with a tie closure for a customizable fit it can be made thicker or thinner by adjusting the number of columns using colorful yarn this headband features a wheat-inspired stitch and is perfect for adding a natural touch to your spring wardrobe **size ** length 51cm 20in width thick band 9cm 3 5in thin band 6cm 2 7in **yarns ** brand royal batik zeeman material 100% polyacryl skein weight 100 grams worsted skein length +/- 241 meters quantity 30g to 50g multicolored **tools ** crochet hook 3 5mm tapestry needle scissors tie **gauge ** 10rows x 10stitches = 10cm x 10cm = 4 inches
